story_arceus_01_08000/2401_1001_0100_10:
The excitement in the arena when you revealed
your arc suits was incredible!
story_arceus_01_08000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Yes, it was. But I couldn’t help but notice
something...
story_arceus_01_08000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Other than us transforming into our arc suits,
nothing particularly happened.
story_arceus_01_08000/2401_1001_0400_10:
We didn’t hear Arceus’s voice this time, nor did it
appear. Were our bonds still not strong enough?
story_arceus_01_08000/2401_1001_0500_10: Or maybe it was expecting a different outcome?
story_arceus_01_08000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Either way, it’s not exactly clear what kind of
“bond” Arceus wants to see...
story_arceus_01_08000/2401_1001_0800_10:
(I bet Volo’s already up to something. He probably
even expects something will happen.)
story_arceus_01_08000/2401_1001_0900_10:
(I wonder what he plans to do next to make
Arceus his own...)
